ygData.subject: Re: [eqbard] A Bard's usefulness after lvl 12
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I actually hadn t intended to play a bard (had my eye on a druid or ranger), and started Kaearia as a see what it s like character (the name was on my
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 20 May 1999, Abraham Hardjana wrote:

> > In keeping with the latest theory, what is your charisma? :-)
>
> Oh geez, I must be one messed up bard =). I actually played a monk
> through most of beta and started a bard towards the end. I have 85
> charisma. When creating my character I was under the false assumption
> that Dexterity and Agility made up you armor class. Which grossly
> incorrect.

I actually hadn't intended to play a bard (had my eye on a
druid or ranger), and started Kaearia as a "see what it's
like" character (the name was on my "cool names to use" list,
originally came from a random name generator). It turned out
to be so much fun to play it's turned into my main character.

> Neat I am shocked that someone has actually read it to some extent. Most
> people checkout my character and never even care about it. For me it has
> been frustrating to get this roleplay going. I have tried to emote and

Well, I haven't read *yours* since I've never met you. But if
someone helps in a fight, or hangs around, or does/says
interesting things, I usually inspect them and read their
character description. I usually inspect party members I've
never met as well.

You are aware that because of that stupid dark blue text, most
people running in full-screen mode never bother reading
emotes?

> you arround. BTW are you a half-elf female? I thought I saw you last
> night, buit before I could confirm the name you camped and blinked out of
> existence.

Wood elf female. Doubt it was me, I was in Oasis last night.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
